comment: Smart Data Models - WindPitchContEmulIEC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/WindPitchContEmulIEC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Pitch control emulator model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.1.

contents.name: WindGenTurbineType2IEC
contents.comment: Wind turbine type 2 model with which this Pitch control emulator model is associated. Default: None

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kdroop
contents.comment: Power error gain (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kipce
contents.comment: Pitch control emulator integral constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: komegaaero
contents.comment: Aerodynamic power change vs. omegachange (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kppce
contents.comment: Pitch control emulator proportional constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: omegaref
contents.comment: Rotor speed in initial steady state (omega). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pimax
contents.comment: Maximum steady state power (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pimin
contents.comment: Minimum steady state power (). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: First time constant in pitch control lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Second time constant in pitch control lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: tpe
contents.comment: Time constant in generator air gap power lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
